text.section:
The Secretary shall refer a claim for benefits to the Board of Appeals if the determination of the claim involves:
a disqualification that is based on a stoppage of work because of a labor dispute;
multiple claims; or
a difficult issue of fact or law.

The Board of Appeals:
promptly shall hear and decide a claim that the Secretary refers under this section; and
may designate a special examiner to hear and decide the claim.
